problem.markdown:
>>What is the most likely behavior for a population with a pyramid age-structure diagram?<< () no growth () growth for one generation and then stabilize (x) increase rapidly () increase slowly at a constant rate () increase rapidly, then decrease
[explanation]
A population with a pyramid age-structure diagram will continue to grow rapidly because there are many young people who will live to a reproductive age and contribute to additional population growth.
[explanation]
problem.p: What is the most likely behavior for a population with a pyramid age-structure diagram?

choicegroup.label: What is the most likely behavior for a population with a pyramid age-structure diagram?
choicegroup.choice: growth for one generation and then stabilize
increase slowly at a constant rate

div.p: A population with a pyramid age-structure diagram will continue to grow rapidly because there are many young people who will live to a reproductive age and contribute to additional population growth.
